buginformation.summary: index fails produce missing property warning
buginformation.description: the following code compiled with verbose warnings with the missing properties check enabled fails produce warning error var new string quot hello quot alert lower case index quot quot however other string functions properly produce the warning var new string quot hello quot alert lower case substr think what happening that array index valid property and lower case array valid assignment assuming that lower case index could theory exist and still type safe would nice could catch this case though this issue was closed revision 765
